# Rate Matrices

The GTR model [@paper:tavare1986] generalizes the JC69 model by allowing
different substitution rates for each pair of nucleotides.

See the implementation in RAxML:
[axml.c lines 1423-1498](https://github.com/stamatak/standard-RAxML/blob/abc123/axml.c#L1423-L1498)

## References

The original paper describing GTR is available at:
https://github.com/stamatak/standard-RAxML

For more details on phylogenetic models, see @paper:felsenstein2004.
